concept.title: Using a Hadoop User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the MapR FS origin to use a Hadoop user to read files from MapR FS.

conbody.p: MapR FS originusing a Hadoop user to read from MapR FSBy default, uses the user account who started it to connect to external systems. When using Kerberos, the uses the Kerberos principal. Make sure updates to this topic go into the destination version of the file.

To use a Hadoop user to connect to MapR FS, perform the following tasks:
On MapR, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the Hadoop user.
For more information, see the MapR documentation.
In the MapR FS origin, enter the Hadoop user name.
